price: Nyamara si byo! Mu by’ukuri Nyagasani we yabaga amubona neza.
arabic: بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: balā inna rabbahu kāna bihi baṣīran
